name: Sky Roads
description: Sky Roads is a clone of the classic 3D space game SkyRoads (Kosmonaut) with roads mode and also an infinite jumper mode. Re-experience the magic of the 1990s 3D space jumping game SkyRoads (Kosmonaut) tweaked for the best experience on a hand held device. Sky Roads is a platform to platform jumping game set in space with a infinitely long high roads where player has to jump over an obstacle or empty space. Control the Space ship using either gestures or accelerometer and overcome the obstacles in space with complete control just like in SkyRoads!
